Public Function CrossValidate (data As IDataView, estimator As IEstimator(Of ITransformer), Optional numFolds As Integer = 5, Optional labelColumn As String = "Label", Optional samplingKeyColumn As String = null, Optional seed As Nullable(Of UInteger) = null) As TrainCatalogBase.CrossValidationResult(Of CalibratedBinaryClassificationMetrics)()

MemberSignature.Usage: binaryClassificationCatalog.CrossValidate (data, estimator, numFolds, labelColumn, samplingKeyColumn, seed)

Docs.param: The data to run cross-validation on.
The estimator to fit.
Number of cross-validation folds.
The label column (for evaluation).

Name of a column to use for grouping rows. If two examples share the same value of the , they are guaranteed to appear in the same subset (train or test). This can be used to ensure no label leakage from the train to the test set. If no row grouping will be performed.
Seed for the random number generator used to select rows for cross-validation folds.
Docs.summary: Run cross-validation over folds of , by fitting , and respecting if provided. Then evaluate each sub-model against and return metrics.
Docs.returns: Per-fold results: metrics, models, scored datasets.
